Game.Name: Zhuo Gui Da Shi- Ghost Hunter
Game.Plot: Zhuo Gui Da Shi: Ghost Hunter (抓鬼大师 GHOST HUNTER) is an unlicensed clone of Capcom's Buster Brothers/Pang for the Sega Mega Drive by the Taiwanese companies Jumbo and Senchi Technology released in 1994. In the game, you move around the bottom of the screen, shooting lasers of variable length to kill enemies without getting hit.
